cleaned_text: Welcome To Three Rivers Natural Medicine We are a Naturopathic and Acupuncture clinic offering individualized, innovative, safe and effective therapies to facilitate healing and prevent disease. We are skilled at matching Natural therapies (homeopathy, acupuncture, herbal medicine, physical medicine, nutrition) with the person to encourage the full and complete healing of mind and body. We offer an ongoing commitment to educate our clients along with the public. This site will allow you to keep informed about the latest research findings in the world of natural medicine. It is our hope to empower you and your family to become the healthiest, most vital and youthful as possible. To prevent the illnesses that can be prevented (ie. heart disease, obesity, diabetes, thyroid disorders, osteoarthritis, dementia, etc) and improve the quality of life of those with chronic conditions and in some cases bring about a cure. This is our highest goal and calling as Naturopathic Doctors. Our office is in Hamilton, Montana which serves; Whitefish, Kalispell, Missoula, Stevensville, Darby, Salmon Idaho, and Spokane Washington. What Our Patients Say Outstanding physicians.
